simplelist.member: M - Set the size of the signal constellation
bits - Input Bit Vector to modulate

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para:
M-ary QAM demodulator with square lattice.
The size of the QAM constellation is $M = 2^k$, where $k = 1, 2, \ldots $. Symbol values in each dimension are: $\{-(\sqrt{M}-1), \ldots, -3, -1, 1, 3, \ldots, (\sqrt{M}-1)\}$. The bitmap is Gray encoded. Symbols are normalized so that the average energy is 1. That is, normalized with $\sqrt{2(M-1)/3}$
M must be some square of 2
